title: Please make it easier to use and fix problems
creator: Brian.C.Harris
content: Thunderbird is so difficult to use. Please improve. I don't know how many users only continue with Thunderbird because they agree with your philosophy. Maybe a lot. I am always fight to make it work. You have to a geek to made perform in an easy way.

title: problème serveur, lien Gmail - Thunderbird
creator: ADM.LABELLEMEUNIERE
content: Bonjour, J'ai créé un message d'absence pendant mes congés, ce message à généré une saturation de ma boite mails, depuis je n'arrive plus à faire fonctionner correctement Thunderbird. Le lien entre Gmail et Thunderbird semble ne plus fonctionner. Comment dois-je procéder ? Est-ce que je peux réinitialiser les paramètres de Thunderbird sans perdre de données et si oui comment ? Merci
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Email Archive
creator: finance31
content:
Hello,

I adjusted the archive settings on our account and now all my archived emails have disappeared and they are no where to be found. Not in trash or spam. I put the archive settings back the way they were and nothing changes. In the web version the emails are still there, so for some reason they are just misplaced in the program. Can you help me figure out where they went?

title: Thunderbird is stating that there are no new emails on my gmail account.  There are emails.
creator: pete.spedding
content: As of today (6th Jan '26) TB claims there are no new emails. This is incorrect, they are there on Gmail, and have appeared on my iphone. Can't find any way of getting TB to play nicely with Gmail, any suggestions for a work round gratefully received.
